overview: If you loved Bareback Hotel, then you're really gonna love this latest title from Au Natural. Bareback Adventure has 18 incredibly gifted young lads, it's totally bareback and totally awesome. Bareback Adventure is a mountainside getaway that contains a 5-way, a 6-way orgy, and the first bareback performances by stars Aaron Hawke and Cameron Jackson. Aaron Hawk and Cameron Jackson are high school buddies who are such close friends that they've actually fallen in love with each other...but secretly. They go on a camping trip together and suck and fuck their way through the forest with 16 other hotties.
title: Bareback Adventure
